OOC: My computer name is Soulstice, the lost name of Beast Wars, I didn't
get to choose my mail, and I don't like to post from the site, so it says
the Code...
> Dark One dived, firing off two missiles at the Mafia base.

(Is this going to go on forever?) Base damage: Base takes damage, but it's
still strong, the most damage given by WarMachine by far.

> Breakdown yelled out as the disk plunged into him.  Transforming into
robot
> mode, he ripped the disk out of his chest, a squirt of blue mech-fluid
> landing on the ground.  "Slag it!" he yelled, raising his grenade
launcher,
> firing off a grenade at Blender, not sure if the fool was to far away to
> shoot.

Blender was too far away, Stronghold drug him from the battle.

"You okay, buddy?" Stronghold asked.

Blender: Yeah, let's leave this planet.

Stronghold: We just have to find a ship.

> Pyro cursed as he saw Stronghold go by, firing off three fire balls at
> Shockaract.

Shokaract (Not Shockaract) yells bring it on as the fireballs go towards
him. They strike him, he's charred black and standing like nothing happened.

"Now it's my turn." Shokaract says. He fires his 3 missiles at Pyro.

> Demon Wulf fired off three optic blasts at the Mafia Base.  "Brother's,
bring
> their puny fortress to be one with the Void!" he ordered.

(The base is pretty big, actually, as big as a large ship, and a really big
one, just making sure you know that.)
